LASTED PROJECTS 
Hospital system  
- Description     : The system consists of 3 basic modules: 
                          - A system to create schedules for doctors, create an automatic  
                            examination schedule and allow patients to register for the 
                            examination from the web or mobile application.  
                          - The API system of payment connection with banks  
      - The system generates codes for patients 
- Duration         : 4 months 
- Team size      : 8 
- Main roles     : - Team leader, Business Analyst, database design  
                          - Web and APIs developer 
                          - Technical and business support for members 
- Technologies : ASP.Net Core, API, PostgreSQL, Bootstrap, JS, React Native 
Employee tracking system  
- Description     : - Build the report system, for all marketing staffs can report at the 
        Place they are working (upload file, schedule, location…) 
      - The system also can save stores information, marketing 
        campaigns and related posters, stickers. 
- Duration         : 3 months  
- Team size      : 5 
- Main roles     : - Business Analyst, database design 
                         - Web and APIs developer 
                         - Technical and business support for members 
- Technologies : ASP.Net MVC, Web API, MySQL, Bootstrap, JS, React Native  
KEC System 
- Description     : - Manage the electrical flow of devices in factories 
                     - Synchronize data between factory and server, export and report 
      - Export, report and analyze the performance of devices 
      - Automatically process to reduce direct intervention of people 
- Duration         : 4 Months  
- Team size      : 5 
- Main roles     : Coding and testing base on detail design and test-case documents 
- Technologies : Java, Oracle  
Store management application 
- Description     : - Store information at the database local stores 
                         - Synchronize local data to Oracle server 
       - Information including: staff, customer, visiting and sale history 
- Duration         : 3 months  
- Team size      : 4 
- Main roles     : Team leader, Business Analyst, database design, coding and 
testing 
- Technologies : C#, Windows Form, SQLite 
Improve system performance 
- Description     : Improve system performance by using stored procedure 
- Duration         : 6 months  
- Team size      : 5 
- Main roles     : Coding and testing base on detail design and test-case documents 
- Technologies : SQL Server, Stored procedure 
UDI Maps 
- Description     : - Help HCMC residents can avoid flooding when circulation on the  
        road. Through this application, people will know which areas are  
        likely to be flooded to find suitable routes to avoid flooding.  
      - Users can interact with managers, giving information about  
        flooding points for direction  
- Duration         : 7 months  
- Team size      : 6 
- Main roles     : Web and APIs Developer 
- Technologies : ASP.Net MVC, Web API, SQL Server, Bootstrap, JS

- Description     : - Company and tour introduction 
      - Tour booking, payment via third parties.  
- Duration         : 5 months  
- Team size      : 6 
- Main roles     : Business analyst  
- Technologies : Php, MySql 
Movie web application 
- Description     : - Render a short video from the template by using the resources 
       from the user upload (video, image, text)  
     - Create an online market, the producers can sale their template, 
       users can buy the templates, upload their resource for rendering 
       a video as they want.  
      - Many agencies can become a partner by providing server 
        hardware support to render videos. 
- Duration         : 1 year 
- Team size      : 8

                         - Web and APIs developer 
- Technologies : ASP.Net MVC, Web API, SQL Server, Bootstrap, JS 
                           Adobe After Effect, Adobe Media Encoder
